text: Saint-Michel-Mont-Mercure is a former commune. It is in Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in west France. On 1 January 2016, it became a part of the new commune of Sèvremont.Arrêté préfectoral 18 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: Saint-Michel-Mont-Mercure
